body.name: Sargart 320GB Ultra Slim Portable External Hard Drive USB3.0 HDD Storage for PC, Mac, Desktop, Laptop, Chromebook, Xbox One, Xbox 360, PS4 (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 17 hrs 5 mins
features: Sturdy Metal Design : All-Aluminum anti-scratch model delivers remarkable strength and durability, this portable hard drive enables you to backup massive data in seconds, delivering ultra fast transfer speed to improve your PC performance
Compatible : Compatible with Windows/Mac/Linux/Android and PS4/Xbox series consoles and so on. stable and fast loading on game consoles
Improve PC Performance : Powered by USB 3.0 technology, this USB hard drive is much faster than but still compatible with USB 2.0 backup drive, allowing for super fast transfer speed
Plug and Play : This external drive is ready to use without external power supply or software installation needed. Ideal extra storage for your computer and game console
What's Included : 1 x Portable external hard drive, 1 x USB 3.0 Cable, Gift-type shell packaging , 3-Year manufacturer's warranty and free technical support services
body.description: Ultra Slim Portable Hard Drive Compatibility This external drive is pre-formatted as exFAT, so you could use it directly on Windows and Mac. Some of the old devices may need reformat. A Reliable Game Drive: This external hard drive features fast and stable. performance for PS4, PS4 Pro, and Xbox One, does not refuse or delete a game. Compatible with Microsoft Windows and Mac OS in the meantime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Mechanical Hard Drive, not SSD
reviews.reviewText: I gave it four stars because it did what it said it was going to do but by today’s standards it’s not really a great product.This has a mechanical hard drive inside of it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Got it for file backup
reviews.reviewText: It is incredibly easy to use. Plug it in and go. I don't really have many large files (video, etc), so 320G gives me plenty of space. I backed up everything on the main laptop I use (we have around 5-6 computers in the house all the time, for different purposes), and everything backed up, mostly not compressed, took up only 1/3 of the space.It was very cheap compared to the usage I'm getting.I highly recommend it unless you want to store a lot of videos

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The worst External Hard Drive I have ever had!
reviews.reviewText: It just doesn't seem to want to work properly. I've had nothing but problems since I got this. First, it wouldn't accept anything in a folder so I tried to add my files separately. That in itself totally messed me up since my files were now scattered all over the external drive and hard to find. Then it would accept some files and not others. Finally, I just said to hell with it, erased everything I put on it, and started fresh again and I'm still having problems! Now it's telling me that it can't read some of my files that it had accepted before. Won't be buying this product again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for backing up important data. Very compact, sleek and easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works perfectly for what I wanted. Sims 4 and the expansion packs were taking up every bit of space on my laptop. I now store it here and have no worries about storage on my laptop!
Tried to reformat, tried to fix the error file. This did not work at all. Total crap. Do not buy.
